title: 09/06/2021 - HOUR 2 - Colin Right/Colin Wrong, Warren Moon, Brian Kelly
itunes:title: 09/06/2021 - HOUR 2 - Colin Right/Colin Wrong, Warren Moon, Brian Kelly
description:
In this hour of The Herd with Colin Cowherd, it's another edition of Where Colin Was Right, Where Colin Was Wrong. Also, NFL Hall of Fame quarterback Warren Moon joins Colin to talk about Dallas quarterback Dak Prescott's return from injury as well as other pertinent NFL topics. Finally, forgive him for his bad jokes, but Notre Dame's Brian Kelly is the best football coach the Irish have had in a long time. 

Guest: Warren Moon

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
